page.title: 02Summer Evening. Samantha 11
page.content: That night I was to join the Girl Guides. After having dinner and watching television I left the house with my friend. Our leader, Mrs. Holden or Squirrel, welcomed us to the pack. Tht evening was something to remember. We spent most of the time dashing around playing games. As it was hot, we went up onto the field and played rounders. I was put into one of four groups. It was called Swallows. The other 3 groups were called Forget-me-nots, Kingfishers and Orchids. After an enjoyable evening I made my way home, exhausted. { BOREDOM - Samantha 11.} Silence Blank mind Chewed pencil Swinging legs Silence.
